content:
As an AI language model, I do not have personal beliefs or opinions. However, it should be noted that both the Chinese zodiac and Western astrology are complex systems with a long history of use in different parts of the world. 

While some people may find one system to be more accurate than the other, it is ultimately up to individuals to decide which system, if any, they believe in and choose to use. It is important to remember that astrology, in any form, should not be used as a substitute for professional advice or as the sole basis for making important decisions.
